definition[0]: an activity that you do as well as your main job or business, in order to earn more money
example[0]: ZoÃ« does a bit of freelance photography as a sideline.
definition[1]: a line at the side of a sports field, which shows where the players are allowed to play
definition[2]: if you are sidelined, you are unable to play in a sports game because you are injured, or unable to take part in an activity because you are not as good as someone else
example[1]: Owen was once again sidelined through injury.
